page.title: 20TELEVISION PROGRAMMES
page.content: For many people watching television has become a very important part of their daily life. There is a choice of three channels, BBC 1 and 2,ITV and Channel 4. Broadcasting starts at 6.30am with "Breakfast TV" and goes on until midnight. The most popular programmes at the moment are the four main "Soap" operas namely Dallas, Dynasty, Coronation Street and The Eastenders. Sporting events such as Wimbledon Tennis, the Test Matches, major golf tournaments, football, athletics are widely covered by the various channels. World sporting events such as the Olympic Games and World Football Cup are beamed via sattelite and have a wide coverage. Other popular programmes include the world of nature and science. Music fans of all types are well catered for.
